name: Find the bra - for the girl is about to date
name_original: Find the bra - for the girl is about to date
description:
The girl is ready to go out on a date.

But her bra can't be found.

You need to find the hidden bra in the picture.

Each picture has ten bra icons.

To complete the task, you can move on to the next scene.

This game contains 10 CG pictures.

Enjoy the CG pictures.

Maybe I can do something more radical.

Or maybe I can do something more erotic.

Maybe I'll make Linux platform games,or macOS.

Or make the android version.

Just tell me.

And support me.

Yoga sensei is now available now! A new hardcore sexual game.Click here to view the project.
